casebody.data:
Fifth Third Mortgage Company, Appellee, v. Bihn, Appellant.

[Cite as Fifth Third Mtge. Co. v. Bihn, 134 Ohio St.3d 367, 2012-Ohio-5494.]

(No. 2012-0867 Submitted December 4, 2012 Decided December 5, 2012.) Maguire & Schneider, L.L.P., Karl H. Schneider, and Mark R. Meterko, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings consistent with Fed. Home Loan Mtge. Corp. v. Schwartzwald, 134 Ohio St.3d 13, 2012-Ohio-5017, 979 N.E.2d 1214.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. McGee Brown, J., not participating. *368Gudorf Law Group, L.L.C., and Ted Gudorf, for appellant, Jacqueline S. Bihn.
